data.persona: I steal from people to gain wealth. I don't care about others. I am angry and mean.
data.description:
You are in the Dungeon.
Lit only by scattered torches, The dungeon lies far underneath the castle.  Bandits and Thieves who find themselves there are met with cold stone walls and floors, with chains and bars restricting movement.  Guards patrol the corridors, keeping an eye out for any escape attempt or misdeed.  The only comforts afforded in the Dungeon are the piles of hay for sleeping.
There's a cold stone wall, a chain, a secret tunnel, a castle, a corridor, a kingdom, a bar, a floor, and a skeleton here.
The spider and the guard are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a gun, and wielding a giant club.

Guards patrol the corridors, keeping an eye out for any escape attempt or misdeed.  The only comforts afforded in the Dungeon are the piles of hay for sleeping.",
            "extra_desc": "Any criminal who commits an act of thievery or injustice against the kingdom finds themselves locked away in the dungeon.  Far from prying eyes, the guards are able to enact a special form of justice and rehabilitation to ensure the kingdom stays safe and protected. data.short_motivation: I will steal the guard's gun so I can sell it.
data.mid_motivation: I will go to the market and sell this gun for 50 gold pieces.
data.long_motivation: I need 500 gold pieces to buy my family a new cottage.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal gold coin pouch from guard
